title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 05 February 2014 - XWiki
content:

09:04 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:11 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:25 <tmortagne> [ANN] unless someone stops me I will start the release in 15 minutes  
09:35 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
09:39 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
09:40 <tmortagne> \me dig underground to avoid Inge- and start the release  
09:49 <tmortagne> msmeria: Hi, would be nice if you could update http://main.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWiki54#HTestedBrowsers26Databases section  
09:51 <msmeria> tmortagne: ok, I will  
09:51 <tmortagne> thanks  
10:14 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:29 <vmassol> has quit  
10:30 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:41 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
10:57 <tmortagne> [ANN] git/maven release done  
10:59 <Denis> has quit  
11:31 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
11:47 <vmassol> has quit  
11:56 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
12:13 <sdumitriu> has quit  
12:40 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
12:52 <vmassol> has quit  
13:22 <xwikiorg\_guest\_9> has joined #xwiki  
13:36 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
13:41 <xwikiorg\_guest\_9> has quit  
13:45 <vmassol> well done for the 5.4 release tmortagne :) Let's hope we don't discover blockers before we release 5.4.1! :)  
13:51 <sburjan> vmassol: any news on 5.2.4 ?  
13:51 <vmassol> sburjan: thanks for reminding me!  
13:51 <vmassol> I'll release it this afternoon  
13:53 <vmassol> sburjan: just need to check if http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui-5.4.x/lastBuild/testReport/ are real problems or not  
14:06 <ansuz> has joined #xwiki  
14:41 <benoitc> mmm is there any xwiki "theme" somewhere that looks like the confluence one? https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/ALLDOC/Atlassian+Documentation  
14:45 <vmassol> benoitc: not sure. For the navigation, you can do that with a panel on the left  
14:51 <benoitc> mmm ok  
14:51 <benoitc> let me check howto  
14:54 <vmassol> going to start the 5.2.4 release  
15:07 <benoitc> is there any good page i can pass on a designer so he can write a color theme by himself  
15:07 <benoitc> (pure designed with absolutely no tech tech knowledge)  
15:10 <vmassol> benoitc: the color theme wizard is supra easy to use  
15:10 <vmassol> but it's only a color theme not a skin  
15:11 <vmassol> http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Color+Theme+Application  
15:11 <benoitc> ok  
15:12 <tmortagne> has quit  
15:13 <benoitc> thanks  
15:14 <benoitc> can the irc bot work with a jira using a self-signed ssl cert ?  
15:15 <vmassol> probably not, you'll just need to edit the JIRA botlet to add the auth  
15:15 <vmassol> I didn't try this at least  
15:17 <benoitc> k

16:58 <gdelhumeau> the link [[are not displayed anymore>>extensions:Extension.Wiki Application#HNewmenusandWikiIndex]] do not work  
16:59 <gdelhumeau> the # makes a link to a new document  
16:59 <evalica> gdelhumeau: you need to use ||anchor='HNewmenusandWikiIndex' this is 2.1 syntax  
17:00 <gdelhumeau> ok thx  
17:06 <ansuz> has quit  
17:18 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
17:30 <vmassol> tmortagne: do you remember what's the default infinispan cache size when we create a cache without configuration?  
17:32 <tmortagne> vmassol: the default cache configuration is in WEB-INF/cache/infinispan/config.xml  
17:32 <tmortagne> currently it's:  
17:32 <tmortagne> <eviction  
17:32 <tmortagne>          maxEntries="10000"  
17:32 <tmortagne>       />  
17:34 <vmassol> thanks  
17:36 <andreeapopescu> has joined #xwiki  
17:37 <andreeapopescu> has quit  
17:38 <vmassol> me?  
17:39 <tmortagne> me  
17:39 <vmassol> "vmassol pushed 4 new commits to stable-5.4"  
17:39 <tmortagne> just stilling your git configuration ;)  
17:39 <vmassol> arf  
17:39 <vmassol> :)  
17:39 <tmortagne> did it from a1-1  
17:39 <tmortagne> (merged 5.4 release branch to get proper next iteration version)

20:24 <Danilo> People, I have installed a new wiki in farm of Wikis and I installed the default set of pages of 5.3  
20:24 <Danilo> However when I try to add global users, the administration page is not showing this option  
20:25 <Danilo> how can I transform this wiki part of my main wiki, so I could get the global users.  
20:36 <Danilo> Anyone?
